name: hornbill
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bird with a large, curved, often brightly coloured beak, found in tropical and subtropical areas: Hornbills live in forests, but also in woodland savannahs in Asia and Africa.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are aviaries holding hornbills, sea eagles, and other bird life.Among the birds, you will see the flash of a kingfisher or hornbill.The bird market caters to the local liking for caged birds, from big hornbills to tiny songsters.Red-billed and Yellow-billed Hornbills from Africa also breed here in the gardens.
